data.name: Fatal Twelve Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack of Fatal Twelve.

Contains 48 tracks across 2 discs including the Opening Theme "Unveil" and Ending Theme "Glass Thread". Download includes a digital copy of the CD jacket which includes a track list and lyrics to the two vocal songs.

Tracklist:
Disc 1
01. Fatum - / 1_ 0 Vertur E
02. Theme of Destiny
03. Lion House Café
04. WARNING
05. Sinking In Flames
06. Unveil (Short)
07. Good Morning (20XX XX XX)
08. A Dot On A Piece Of Paper
09. Amusement Park / Day
10. Amusement Park / Bright Night
11. Rinka's Room
12. The Sacred Large Hall
13. Do You Understand?
14. Powerless
15. Miharu
16. Welcome Back, My Master E> ;)
17. Two Crossing Paths -S/I V/S-
18. Rain
19. Villain
20. Chilling With Sidekicks
21. Odette
22. Alan
23. The Battle Begins
24. Numb
25. Fated Selection
26. Entrusted Feelings

Disc 2
27. At Amecha Girls' University High School
28. Regular Ordinary Girlish Chat Time
29. Naomi
30. Bonds
31. Rinka
32. Town
33. Cultural Festival
34. Intel Investigation Underway
35. Impatience
36. He Reveals me The Answer
37. Despair
38. W i H g L n (Dark Side Of Hers)
39. The Memory Remains
40. A Time of Healing
41. Fall Into...
42. All For You
43. Moment of Fate
44. Good Night (20XX 07 23)
45. Unveil
46. Garasu no ito
47. The Girl's Song
48. Fate

Soundtrack Staff:

Soundtrack Composer: Low

"Unveil"
Vocal: Kuyuri
Guitar Solo: Gesshi
Lyrics: TOSHIKI (from DAIZY BLUE)
Composition/Arrangement: Low

"Glass Thread"
Vocal: Kuyuri
Guitar Solo: Gesshi
Lyrics: Akeo
Composition/Arrangement: Low

data.short_description: The complete soundtrack of the suspense visual novel, Fatal Twelve. Contains 48 tracks including the opening theme "Unveil" and the ending theme "Glass Thread".
